content: this is a project that can be worked up really quickly and uses up some of that scrap yarn customize them for any holiday or special occasion think of party or wedding favors or as a small stand-alone thank you a random act of kindness an i m thinking of you or include them with other items in a larger gift package i also think that they would be great at craft markets as a lower priced item option so many possibilities materials crochet hook size size e/4 3 5mm stitch marker s scissors tapestry needle keyring chapstick tube s - regular 0 15 oz 4 25g size worsted 4-medium weight yarn in any color and brand that you choose this makes a great stash buster other yarn weights could be used but pattern adjustments may be needed abbreviations/stitches used blo - back loop only chain chain row s - row single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch s work instructions between brackets as many times as directed magic_ring/magic_ring
